home.hero.title: PLATAFORMA DE INFRAESTRUCTURA FINTECH
home.hero.description: We build modular, API-first products that help payment providers and financial institutions reconcile data, authenticate cardholders and automate high-volume financial operations.
home.subtitle_1:
DESIGNED FOR EVERY PART
OF THE PAYMENT ECOSYSTEM

FINTECH
COMPANIES
ecosystem.card_1.text: Accelerate product growth with one-click deployment of modular components.

BANKS
& PROCESSING CENTERS

ECOMMERCE
& MARKETPLACES

PAYMENT SERVICE
PROVIDERS (PSPS)

ecosystem.card_5.title: LARGE ENTERPRISES WITH HIGH TRANSACTION VOLUMES
home.section_3.title: URENKOFF DEVELOPS CLOUD-NATIVE INFRASTRUCTURE FOR MISSION-CRITICAL PAYMENT AND BANKING OPERATIONS.
home.product_card_1.title: LEDGER MATCH
product_card_1.item_1: Automate transaction matching across all data sources (payment providers, banks, internal systems)
product_card_1.item_2: Configure custom matching rules for any workflow
product_card_1.item_3: Detect discrepancies instantly with real-time diagnostics
product_card_1.item_4: Reduce manual work and improve operational accuracy
home.product_card_2.title: 3DS AUTHCONTROL
product_card_2.item_2: Smart transaction diagnostics for higher approval rates
product_card_2.item_3: Flexible authentication routing across issuers and schemes
product_card_2.item_4: Rich risk insights for better fraud and liability decisions
home.cta.title: READY TO TRY IT WITH YOUR OWN DATA?
home.cta.description: Start your first project in minutes.
home.advantage_1.title: FINTECH ECOSYSTEM
home.advantage_1.text: Our products plug into your existing fintech stack — AML, reporting, risk and other systems — via our partners’ platforms and APIs.
home.advantage_2.title: SAAS & ENTERPRISE DEPLOYMENT
home.advantage_2.text: Use Urenkoff as SaaS in our cloud or deploy in your own infrastructure for full enterprise control.
home.advantage_3.title: SELF-SERVICE ONBOARDING & PAY-AS-YOU-GO
home.advantage_3.text: Configure products yourself, activate environments in a few steps and pay by plan or per transaction.
home.subtitle_3:
HOW URENKOFF FITS
INTO YOUR DAY-TO-DAY
home.lm.step_1.title:
CONNECT
YOUR DATA
home.lm.step_1.text: Connect Urenkoff to banks, PSPs, gateways, POS systems, and ERPs using ready-to-use connectors or custom sources.
home.lm.step_2.title:
MATCH
AUTOMATICALLY
home.lm.step_2.text: Transactions are normalized and matched across all sources — payments, bank statements, GL, AR/AP — using configurable rules.
home.lm.step_3.title:
REVIEW
& REPORT
home.lm.step_3.text: Review only exceptions, resolve discrepancies, and push validated data to your GL with audit-ready reports.

blue_card.cta.description: From startups to enterprise teams — handles growing volumes, multiple entities, and regional compliance without increasing operational load.
home.subtitle_5:
SECURITY & COMPLIANCE
YOU CAN STAND BEHIND
home.advantage_4.title: ENTERPRISE-GRADE DATA ENCRYPTION
home.advantage_4.text: All financial data is encrypted in transit and at rest to prevent unauthorized access at every stage.
home.advantage_5.title: ROLE-BASED ACCESS CONTROL
home.advantage_5.text: Granular permissions ensure users only see and manage what they are authorized to access.
home.advantage_6.title: FULL AUDIT TRAILS AND ACTIVITY LOGS
home.advantage_6.text: Every action is logged and traceable, providing full visibility for audits and internal reviews.
home.advantage_7.title: SECURE INFRASTRUCTURE & ACCESS ISOLATION

home.footer.cta.title: READY TO SCALE YOUR PAYMENT OPERATIONS?

lm.hero.title:
LEDGER
MATCH
lm.hero.description:
Automated reconciliation across providers, banks,
and internal systems — without manual checks.
lm.feature_1.title:
AUTOMATED
DATA ONBOARDING
lm.feature_1.text: Upload raw transaction data and let the system automatically detect structure, formats, and relationships. Urenkoff prepares your datasets for reconciliation with minimal manual configuration, reducing onboarding time from days to minutes.
lm.feature_2.title: SMART MATCHING ENGINE
lm.feature_2.text: Automatically match transactions across multiple data sources using configurable, rule-based logic. Control matching order, tolerances, and conditions to handle complex reconciliation scenarios at scale.
lm.feature_3.title:
DATA TRANSFORMATION
& ENRICHMENT
lm.feature_3.text: Normalize, transform, and enrich data before reconciliation without modifying the original source. Create derived fields, align formats, and prepare consistent datasets for accurate matching.
lm.feature_4.title: ACCESS CONTROL & USER MANAGEMENT
lm.feature_4.text: Manage users, roles, and permissions with granular control across the platform. Ensure the right level of access for every team member while maintaining strict operational and security boundaries.
lm.feature_5.title: LEDGER MATCH WORKFLOW
lm.feature_5.text: Run reconciliations through a structured, step-by-step workflow with full visibility into progress and results. Review exceptions, assign ownership, and resolve unmatched records in a controlled process.
lm.feature_6.title: API-FIRST INTEGRATION
lm.feature_6.text: Integrate reconciliation capabilities directly into your systems through a secure, developer-ready API. Manage tokens, monitor requests, and scale integrations without operational friction.
lm.cta.title: FROM FEATURES TO REAL OPERATIONAL CONTROL
lm.cta.description: Urenkoff fits directly into your daily reconciliation process — without changing how finance teams work.

HOW URENKOFF FITS INTO
YOUR DAY-TO-DAY

3ds.hero.title:
3DS
AUTHCONTROL
3ds.hero.description: Urenkoff gives you EMV-certified 3D Secure 2.X cardholder authentication — so you reduce fraud, shift liability, and boost checkout approval rates.
3ds.subtitle_1:
HOW URENKOFF 3DS ADAPTS
TO YOUR BUSINESS
3ds.feature_1.title: SMART TRANSACTION DIAGNOSTICS
3ds.feature_1.text: Analyze failed and successful transactions with full technical context. See issuer responses, error codes, and message flow to quickly understand root causes and improve approval rates.
3ds.feature_2.title: NL BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE
3ds.feature_2.text: Query transaction and performance data using natural language instead of dashboards and SQL. Get instant summaries and cross-metric insights for operations, risk, and support teams.
3ds.feature_3.title: TRANSACTION MONITORING  & SEARCH
3ds.feature_3.text: Track every transaction across its full lifecycle in real time. Search, filter, and inspect large transaction volumes instantly without performance degradation.
3ds.feature_4.title: ACCESS CONTROL & USER MANAGEMENT
3ds.feature_4.text: Manage users, roles, and permissions across all platform modules. Ensure strict access boundaries while supporting collaboration between operations, risk, and finance teams.
3ds.feature_5.title:
DASHBOARD
& REAL-TIME ANALYTICS
3ds.feature_5.text: Monitor key authentication and transaction metrics as they happen. Identify anomalies, performance drops, and volume changes in a single operational view.
3ds.feature_6.title: REPORTING & BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE
3ds.feature_6.text: Generate audit-ready reports for performance, compliance, and business analysis. Schedule exports and deliver structured data to internal teams or external stakeholders.
3ds.feature_7.title: TEST HUB/API SANDBOX
3ds.feature_7.text: Test authentication and transaction flows in a safe, isolated environment. Use mock data, test tokens, and interactive API documentation before going live.
3ds.feature_8.title: SYSTEM & SECURITY CONFIGURATION
3ds.feature_8.text: Manage API keys, certificates, and security settings from one place. Maintain full traceability of changes while enforcing strict security controls.
3ds.cta.title: FAST, SELF-SERVICE ONBOARDING
3ds.cta.description: Create an account, connect your card, run required EMV 3DS test cases and activate your production environment — all without interacting with support. Enterprise customers may request guided onboarding if needed.
3ds.subtitle_2:
HOW URENKOFF FITS INTO
YOUR PAYMENT FLOW
3ds.steps.description: Minimal IT effort. Fast rollout. Secure from day one.
3ds.step_1.title:
QUICK
INTEGRATION
3ds.step_1.text:
Integrate via simple API
or SDK — no heavy infrastructure,
fast sandbox testing.
3ds.step_2.title: REAL-TIME AUTHENTICATION
3ds.step_2.text:
Every card payment triggers
3D Secure 2.0 (frictionless or challenge) before authorization.
3ds.step_3.title:
PAYMENT
PROCEEDS
3ds.step_3.text:
More approvals, liability shift,
fully secure and compliant
transaction.
3ds.subtitle_3: WHAT CHANGES WHEN AUTHENTICATION RUNS ON URENKOFF
3ds.advantage_1.title: INTELLIGENT ROUTING
3ds.advantage_1.text: Route authentication requests based on issuer behavior and regional rules.
3ds.advantage_2.title: RISK-BASED DECISIONS
3ds.advantage_2.text: Adapt authentication flow dynamically based on transaction risk.
3ds.advantage_3.title: BUILT-IN COMPLIANCE
3ds.advantage_3.text: Meet SCA and PSD2 requirements automatically across supported regions.
3ds.advantage_4.title: EXEMPTIONS & FALLBACKS
3ds.advantage_4.text: Apply exemptions and fallback flows without breaking the payment journey.
3ds.advantage_5.title: GLOBAL COMPATIBILITY
3ds.advantage_5.text: Compatible with major card schemes and issuing banks worldwide.
3ds.advantage_6.title: ENTERPRISE SCALABILITY
3ds.advantage_6.text: Handle high transaction volumes with predictable performance and uptime.
3ds.footer_cta.title: READY TO SECURE EVERY CARD PAYMENT WITH URENKOFF?
3ds.footer_cta.description: Start testing 3DS flows in a sandbox environment in minutes.
ado.hero.title:
AUTOMATED
DATA ONBOARDING
ado.hero.description:
Upload your data and let the system prepare
it for reconciliation automatically.
ado.card_1.title: GUIDED DATA UPLOAD
ado.card_1.text: Upload one or multiple data files and group them into reconciliation-ready datasets. The guided flow minimizes manual input during onboarding. Data is structured from the start. This accelerates time to first reconciliation.
ado.card_2.title: AI DATA STRUCTURE RECOGNITION
ado.card_2.text: The system automatically detects columns, formats, and relationships in uploaded data. Manual mapping is significantly reduced. Structure recognition adapts to different source formats. Setup becomes faster and more reliable.
ado.card_3.title: PRE-RUN CONFIGURATION REVIEW
ado.card_3.text: Before execution, the system validates the full configuration and data setup. Potential issues are detected early. This prevents failed runs and incorrect results. Teams can launch reconciliations with confidence.
ado.footer_cta.title: GET YOUR DATA RECONCILIATION-READY IN MINUTES
sme.hero.title: SMART MATCHING ENGINE
sme.hero.description: Automatically match transactions across sources with configurable rules and full control over exceptions.
sme.card_1.title: RULE-BASED MATCHING
sme.card_1.text: Matching is driven by explicit, rule-based logic defined by the user. Each rule produces deterministic and explainable outcomes. This eliminates black-box behavior and increases trust in results. Matching decisions are fully transparent.
sme.card_2.title: MATCHING CRITERIA CREATION
sme.card_2.text: Define matching criteria using multiple fields, tolerances, and references. The engine adapts to real-world data variability across systems. Criteria can evolve as data changes. This enables accurate reconciliation in complex environments.
sme.card_3.title:
DRAG-AND-DROP
RULE ORDERING
sme.card_3.text: Control the order in which matching rules are executed using a visual interface. Prioritize critical rules and resolve conflicts explicitly. Execution order directly impacts matching precision. This gives teams full control over reconciliation logic.
sme.footer_cta.title: TAKE CONTROL OF TRANSACTION MATCHING
dte.hero.title: DATA TRANSFORMATION & ENRICHMENT
dte.hero.description: Prepare, enrich, and normalize raw data before reconciliation — directly inside the platform.
dte.card_1.title: FIELD-LEVEL DATA TRANSFORMATION
dte.card_1.text: Raw data fields are transformed to align formats and values across sources before reconciliation. This normalization step reduces mismatches caused by inconsistent structures. Transformations are applied systematically and transparently. The result is a clean, reconciliation-ready dataset.
dte.card_2.title: DERIVED SOURCE FIELDS
dte.card_2.text: Create virtual fields derived from existing data without modifying the original source. These calculated fields support complex matching and analysis scenarios. Data lineage is fully preserved. This approach adds flexibility while maintaining source integrity.
dte.card_3.title: DATA FIELD TRANSFORMATIONS
dte.card_3.text: Transformations can be applied at the individual field level to adjust formats, values, or representations. This prepares data for accurate matching and downstream processing. Changes are predictable and repeatable. Data consistency improves across reconciliation runs.
dte.footer_cta.title: PREPARE YOUR DATA FOR ACCURATE RECONCILIATION
acum.hero.title:
ACCESS
CONTROL & USER MANAGEMENT
acum.hero.description: Track every 3DS transaction across its full lifecycle. From authentication request to final outcome.
acum.card_1.title:
ROLE-BASED
ACCESS CONTROL
acum.card_1.text: Access to data and actions is controlled through predefined user roles. Each role determines what users can view, modify, or approve. This prevents unauthorized operations and limits exposure of sensitive information. The model aligns with enterprise security policies.
acum.card_2.title: PERMISSION MANAGEMENT
acum.card_2.text: Permissions can be configured at a granular level to control specific actions within the platform. Approval hierarchies and operational boundaries are enforced through configuration. This reduces operational risk and supports separation of duties. Permissions remain transparent and auditable.
acum.card_3.title: USER LIFECYCLE MANAGEMENT
acum.card_3.text: Manage users throughout their entire lifecycle, from onboarding to deactivation. Roles and permissions can evolve as responsibilities change. All user access is centrally controlled. This simplifies administration while maintaining security.
acum.card_4.title: GRANULAR ROLE CONFIGURATION
acum.card_4.text: Create custom roles tailored to organizational needs across teams and functions. Permissions can span products, workflows, and actions. This enables precise access control without rigid limitations. The model is designed for compliance-driven environments.
acum.footer_cta.title: SECURE PERMISSIONS FOR MISSION-CRITICAL SYSTEMS
lmw.hero.title: LEDGER MATCH WORKFLOW
lmw.hero.description: Run, review, and finalize reconciliations through a controlled, step-by-step workflow.
lmw.card_1.title: WORKFLOW-BASED RECONCILIATION EXECUTION
lmw.card_1.text: Each reconciliation run follows a clearly defined, step-by-step workflow with explicit stages and statuses. This ensures deterministic execution and predictable outcomes across all reconciliation groups. Teams always understand where the process is and what happens next. The workflow is designed to support high-volume, repeatable operations.
lmw.card_2.title: RECONCILIATION PROGRESS TRACKING
lmw.card_2.text: Monitor reconciliation progress in real time across all groups and runs. Instantly see which reconciliations are completed, in progress, or require attention. Progress indicators provide operational transparency at scale. This allows teams to react quickly to delays or failures.
lmw.card_3.title: EXCEPTION & UNMATCHED REVIEW
lmw.card_3.text: Unmatched and partially matched records are reviewed in a centralized interface with full context. Side-by-side comparisons help identify discrepancies quickly. Each exception includes all relevant data needed for investigation. This significantly reduces resolution time and manual effort.
lmw.card_4.title: MANUAL RECORD MANAGEMENT
lmw.card_4.text: For edge cases that require intervention, records can be added or adjusted directly within the reconciliation flow. Manual actions are fully controlled and traceable. This ensures flexibility without compromising data integrity. All changes remain audit-ready.
lmw.card_5.title: RECORD-LEVEL COLLABORATION
lmw.card_5.text: Teams can collaborate directly on individual records using comments and discussion history. All communication stays attached to the specific discrepancy. This eliminates external back-and-forth and preserves investigation context. Collaboration becomes part of the audit trail.
lmw.card_6.title:
REVIEW
OWNERSHIP
lmw.card_6.text: Each reconciliation can be assigned to a responsible reviewer for final approval. Ownership ensures accountability and prevents unresolved discrepancies. Approval flows support internal controls and compliance requirements. No reconciliation is closed without explicit confirmation.
lmw.footer_cta.title: RUN RECONCILIATIONS WITH FULL VISIBILITY AND CONTROL
api_first.hero.title: API-FIRST INTEGRATION
api_first.hero.description: Integrate reconciliation workflows directly into your systems via a secure, developer-ready API.
api_first.card_1.title: DEVELOP-READY API DOCUMENTATION
api_first.card_1.text: The platform provides clear, versioned API documentation designed for engineering teams. Endpoints are fully described with request and response structures. Interactive documentation allows developers to test integrations quickly. This reduces integration time and implementation risk.
api_first.card_2.title: SECURE API TOKEN MANAGEMENT
api_first.card_2.text: API access is secured through managed authentication tokens generated directly in the dashboard. Separate credentials can be used for sandbox and production environments. Tokens support rotation and instant revocation. This ensures secure access without disrupting live integrations.
api_first.card_3.title: RECONCILIATION CONTROL VIA API
api_first.card_3.text: Reconciliation workflows can be triggered and managed programmatically via API. Systems can retrieve reconciliation status, results, and exceptions in real time. Matched and unmatched records are accessible for downstream automation. This enables fully automated reconciliation pipelines.
api_first.card_4.title: ENTERPRISE-GRADE INTEGRATION ARCHITECTURE
api_first.card_4.text: The APIs are designed to fit into existing banking and payment infrastructures. Stateless architecture supports horizontal scaling and high transaction volumes. Integrations work with both modern microservices and legacy systems. This allows adoption without architectural rewrites.
api_first.footer_cta.title: CONNECT RECONCILIATION DIRECTLY TO YOUR SYSTEMS
std.hero.title:
SMART
TRANSACTION
DIAGNOSTICS
std.hero.description: Analyze every 3DS transaction to identify failure reasons, issuer responses, and decision paths in real time.
std.card_1.title:
AI-POWERED
FAILURE ANALYSIS
std.card_1.text: The system automatically analyzes failed transactions to identify root causes in real time. It correlates issuer responses, network signals, and transaction context. This removes guesswork from failure investigation. Teams can focus on fixing issues instead of searching for causes.
std.card_2.title: TRANSACTION LIFECYCLE VISUALIZATION
std.card_2.text: View the full transaction lifecycle from initiation to final outcome. Each stage is clearly visualized with status and timing information. This provides end-to-end transparency across authentication and authorization steps. Bottlenecks become immediately visible.
std.card_3.title: MESSAGE FLOW INTERPRETATION
std.card_3.text: Inspect request and response messages exchanged at each transaction step. Message-level visibility helps identify formatting, routing, or issuer-related issues. All data is presented in a readable and structured format. This simplifies troubleshooting and audits.
std.card_4.title: RECOMMENDED ACTIONS
std.card_4.text: Based on observed patterns, the system highlights potential optimization actions. Recommendations help improve routing, rules, or configuration. Teams gain guidance without manual analysis. This accelerates approval rate improvements.
std.footer_cta.title: STOP GUESSING WHY TRANSACTIONS FAIL
nl.hero.title: NL BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE
nl.hero.description: Explore transaction and performance data using natural language — no SQL or dashboards required.
nl.card_1.title: CONVERSATIONAL QUERIES
nl.card_1.text: Ask questions in natural language to explore transaction and performance data. No SQL or dashboards are required. Queries are translated into structured analysis automatically. This lowers the barrier to insights across teams.
nl.card_2.title: INSTANT SUMMARIES
nl.card_2.text: Results are returned as concise summaries instead of raw tables. Key metrics and trends are highlighted immediately. This enables faster understanding of complex data. Decision-making becomes more efficient.
nl.card_3.title: CROSS-METRIC INSIGHTS
nl.card_3.text: Analyze relationships across multiple metrics in a single query. Identify patterns between approval rates, regions, issuers, and errors. Insights span operational and performance data. Context is preserved across dimensions.
nl.card_4.title: OPERATIONAL SUPPORT
nl.card_4.text: Insights are designed to support daily operational and risk decisions. Teams can quickly investigate anomalies and trends. This reduces dependency on analysts. Business intelligence becomes accessible in real time.
nl.footer_cta.title:
TURN QUESTIONS
INTO DECISIONS
tms.hero.title:
TRANSACTION
MONITORING
& SEARCH
tms.hero.description: Track every 3DS transaction across its full lifecycle. From authentication request to final outcome.
tms.card_1.title:
TRANSACTION
LOG & HISTORY
tms.card_1.text: Access a centralized log of all transactions with full historical context. Each record includes status, timestamps, and related metadata. This provides a single source of truth. Investigations become faster and more reliable.
tms.card_2.title: SMART FILTERING & SEARCH
tms.card_2.text: Powerful filters allow quick searches across large transaction datasets. Narrow results by status, time, merchant, or other attributes. Queries return results instantly. This saves time during incident analysis.
tms.card_3.title: REAL-TIME TRANSACTION MONITORING
tms.card_3.text: Monitor incoming transactions live as they occur. Real-time visibility enables immediate response to issues. Teams can spot anomalies early. Operational awareness improves significantly.
tms.card_4.title: MESSAGE & API LOGS
tms.card_4.text: Inspect full request and response logs for API and message flows. Logs support debugging, audits, and compliance reviews. All interactions are traceable. This ensures transparency across integrations.
tms.footer_cta.title:
FIND ANY TRANSACTION
IN SECONDS
drta.hero.title: DASHBOARD & REAL-TIME ANALYTICS
drta.hero.description: See your 3DS performance in real time. Monitor what matters while transactions are happening.
drta.card_1.title: REAL-TIME PERFORMANCE METRICS
drta.card_1.text: Key performance indicators are updated in real time. Metrics reflect live transaction and authentication activity. Teams always see current system health. Decisions are based on fresh data.
drta.card_2.title: AUTHENTICATION VOLUME TRENDS
drta.card_2.text: Track authentication and transaction volumes over time. Trends reveal growth, spikes, and anomalies. Historical context supports capacity planning. Performance patterns become clear.
drta.card_3.title:
LIVE
TRANSACTION SNAPSHOT
drta.card_3.text: View the most recent transactions as they happen. Each snapshot includes status and outcome. This supports rapid operational monitoring. Issues can be detected immediately.
drta.card_4.title:
AUTHENTICATION STATUS
BREAKDOWN
drta.card_4.text: See a clear breakdown of outcomes by status. Successes, challenges, and failures are visually separated. This highlights approval performance at a glance. Optimization opportunities stand out.
drta.footer_cta.title:
ACT ON REAL-TIME
INSIGHTS
rbi.hero.title:
REPORTING
& BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE
rbi.hero.description: Audit-ready 3DS reporting without manual work. Built for compliance, finance, and performance analysis.
rbi.card_1.title: PERFORMANCE REPORTING OVERVIEW
rbi.card_1.text: High-level reports summarize key performance and authentication metrics. Trends are visualized over selected periods. Reports support strategic analysis. Stakeholders gain clear visibility.
rbi.card_2.title: PREBUILT REPORT TEMPLATES
rbi.card_2.text: Ready-made templates cover common business and compliance needs. Reports can be generated without configuration. This speeds up reporting cycles. Consistency is maintained across teams.
rbi.card_3.title:
SCHEDULED
& AUTOMATED REPORTS
rbi.card_3.text: Reports can be generated and delivered on a recurring schedule. Automation reduces manual effort. Stakeholders receive updates automatically. Reporting becomes predictable and scalable.
rbi.card_4.title: FLEXIBLE REPORT CONFIGURATION & EXPORT
rbi.card_4.text: Customize reports by merchant, time range, and format. Export data in standard formats for sharing or audits. Configuration remains simple. Outputs fit enterprise workflows.
rbi.footer_cta.title:
AUTOMATE REPORTING
AT SCALE
test_hub.hero.title: TEST HUB / API SANDBOX
test_hub.hero.description: Safely test 3DS flows before going live. Validate behavior without risking production traffic.
test_hub.card_1.title: API SANDBOX ENVIRONMENT
test_hub.card_1.text: Test integrations in an isolated sandbox environment. Production systems remain unaffected. Engineers can validate behavior safely. Integration risks are reduced.
test_hub.card_2.title: INTERACTIVE API DOCUMENTATION
test_hub.card_2.text: Explore and test API endpoints directly from the documentation. Requests and responses are visible in real time. Developers can iterate faster. Onboarding time decreases.
test_hub.card_3.title: TEST CARD MANAGEMENT
test_hub.card_3.text: Simulate real transaction scenarios using test cards. Different outcomes can be reproduced reliably. This supports end-to-end testing. Behavior is validated before production.
test_hub.card_4.title:
API REQUEST
LOGS
test_hub.card_4.text: Inspect API requests and responses in real time. Logs provide visibility during testing and debugging. Issues are identified quickly. Integration quality improves.
test_hub.footer_cta.title:
AUTOMATE REPORTING
AT SCALE
sso.hero.title:
SYSTEM
& SECURITY CONFIGURATION
sso.hero.description: Safely test 3DS flows before going live. Validate behavior without risking production traffic.
sso.card_1.title: API KEYS & CERTIFICATES MANAGEMENT
sso.card_1.text: Manage API keys and certificates from a centralized interface. Credentials are clearly organized and controlled. Secure communication is enforced. Access remains manageable at scale.
sso.card_2.title: SECURE KEY LIFECYCLE
sso.card_2.text: Keys support generation, rotation, and revocation throughout their lifecycle. Compromised credentials can be disabled instantly. Security risks are minimized. Operations remain uninterrupted.
sso.card_3.title: AUDIT & CONFIGURATION TRACEABILITY
sso.footer_cta.title:
CONFIGURE ONCE.
OPERATE SECURELY
faq.hero.title:
FREQUENTLY ASKED
QUESTIONS ABOUT
URENKOFF
faq.question_1: WHAT DO I NEED TO START USING URENKOFF PRODUCTS?
faq.answer_1: You only need to create an account and upload your first dataset (for Reconciliation) or configure your 3DS project. Everything else is fully self-service.
faq.question_2: DO I NEED TO TALK TO SALES BEFORE I CAN TRY THE PLATFORM?
faq.answer_2: No. You can start immediately. Sign up, connect billing, and access the sandbox without waiting for approvals or onboarding calls.
faq.question_3: CAN I DEPLOY URENKOFF PRODUCTS IN MY OWN INFRASTRUCTURE?
faq.answer_3: Yes. All products support both SaaS cloud deployment and enterprise on-premise installation.
faq.question_4: IS THE RECONCILIATION SYSTEM COMPATIBLE WITH MULTIPLE PAYMENT PROVIDERS?
faq.answer_4: Our 3DS solution uses smart transaction diagnostics and intelligent routing to choose the optimal authentication path, resulting in higher approval and lower friction for customers.
faq.question_5: WHAT FILE FORMATS DOES THE RECONCILIATION SYSTEM SUPPORT?
faq.answer_5: CSV, XLSX, JSON, and custom flat-file formats. The system can auto-detect structure and map fields during import.
faq.question_6: CAN I CUSTOMIZE RULES FOR MATCHING AND ANOMALY DETECTION?
faq.answer_6: Yes. You can create custom rules, thresholds, and logic for matching payments, identifying discrepancies, and triggering alerts.
faq.question_7: IS THERE AN API FOR INTEGRATING URENKOFF INTO OUR CURRENT SYSTEMS?
faq.answer_7: Yes. We provide a full REST API for importing data, triggering reconciliations, retrieving results, and managing 3DS authentication flows.
faq.answer_8: You can choose between fixed monthly plans or pay-as-you-go billing based on transaction volume.
faq.answer_9: Urenkoff uses enterprise-grade security, encryption at rest and in transit, role-based access control, and isolated environments for each client.
faq.cta.title: READY TO SCALE YOUR PAYMENT OPERATIONS?
faq.cta.description: Start with our sandbox in minutes.

about_us.hero.title: BUILDING FINANCIAL INFRASTRUCTURE FOR MODERN PAYMENTS
about_us.hero.description: Urenkoff builds on-demand, cost-effective financial technology designed for scale, security, and real-world operations.
about_us.card_1.title: URENKOFF
about_us.card_1.text:
Is a technology-driven company operating in the payments industry since 2021.
We build secure, reliable, and scalable infrastructure for businesses working at the intersection of payments, banking, and SaaS. Our focus is on production-grade systems designed for real operational environments.
about_us.card_2.title: WHO WE ARE
about_us.card_2.text_1:
Urenkoff is built by professionals with deep, hands-on experience in the global payment ecosystem.
Our team consists entirely of specialists with 10+ years of industry experience, covering payment processing, banking infrastructure, and enterprise software development.
about_us.card_2.text_2: This background allows us to understand not only how payment systems work technically, but also how regulatory, operational, and risk-related challenges affect real businesses.
about_us.competencies_card_1.title:
EXPERTISE
YOU CAN TRUST
about_us.competencies_card_1.text: We combine deep knowledge across multiple domains to build solutions that work in practice, not just in theory.
about_us.competencies_card_2.title:
PAYMENT SYSTEMS
& CARD NETWORKS
about_us.competencies_card_2.text: We understand the full lifecycle of card-based transactions, scheme rules, and network behavior across regions.
about_us.competencies_card_3.title:
BANKING & FINANCIAL
INFRASTRUCTURE
about_us.competencies_card_3.text: Our experience includes building systems that operate in regulated, audit-driven environments with strict reliability requirements.
about_us.competencies_card_4.title:
SAAS & MODERN
ARCHITECTURES
about_us.competencies_card_4.text: We design cloud-native, API-first platforms that scale predictably and integrate into existing systems.
about_us.subtitle_3: THIS MULTIDISCIPLINARY BACKGROUND ENABLES US TO DESIGN SOLUTIONS THAT ARE BOTH TECHNICALLY ROBUST AND COMMERCIALLY PRACTICAL.
about_us.card_3.title:
SECURITY
AS A FOUNDATION
about_us.card_3.text_1: Security is a core principle at Urenkoff. We design our platforms with a security-first mindset, ensuring that sensitive payment data is protected at every stage — from ingestion and processing to storage and reporting.
about_us.card_3.text_2: We strictly follow PCI requirements and industry best practices to meet the expectations of regulated financial environments and enterprise-scale operations.
about_us.card_4.title: SECURE DEVELOPMENT LIFECYCLE
about_us.card_4.text_1: Our security approach is embedded into the way we build and operate our platforms:
about_us.card_4.list_item_3: Continuous alignment with the latest security requirements and industry standards
about_us.card_4.text_2: This ensures our systems remain resilient, compliant, and future-ready.
about_us.approach_1.title:
TRUST BUILT INTO
EVERY LAYER
about_us.approach_1.text: Trust is the foundation of everything we build at Urenkoff. Security, reliability, and transparency are embedded into our platforms to support critical payment operations in regulated environments.
about_us.approach_2.title:
BUILT TOGETHER
WITH OUR CLIENTS
about_us.approach_2.text: We work closely with partners and clients to deliver technology that meets the highest standards of performance, reliability, and compliance. Our solutions are shaped by real operational needs, not assumptions.
about_us.footer_cta.title: BUILD WITH CONFIDENCE
about_us.footer_cta.description:
Discover how Urenkoff can support your payment and
reconciliation workflows — from integration to production.
security.hero.title:
YOUR DATA, SECURED
BY GLOBAL STANDARDS
security.hero.description: At Urenkoff, we understand that trust is the currency of the digital age. As a modern card acquirer, we do not view security as a feature, we view it as the foundation of our entire platform. We have engineered our SaaS infrastructure from the ground up to meet and exceed the rigorous demands of the financial industry, ensuring that every transaction is wrapped in layers of enterprise-grade protection.
security.card_1.title: BUILT ON INTERNATIONAL FRAMEWORKS
security.card_1.text: Our compliance program is not just a checklist; it is a culture. Urenkoff aligns its operations with the most respected security frameworks in the world, including ISO 27001, NIST, and CIS benchmarks. Furthermore, as a payment processor, we strictly adhere to PCI-DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard) requirements. This multi-layered approach ensures that we are constantly auditing, verifying, and improving our defenses against evolving threats.
security.card_2.title: ACTIVE THREAT DETECTION & TESTING
security.card_2.text: We don’t wait for threats to arrive; we proactively search for them. Our systems undergo regular, intensive penetration testing and vulnerability assessments conducted by certified security professionals. By simulating real-world attacks, we validate our defenses and ensure our software is resilient. We employ continuous monitoring to detect anomalies instantly, ensuring 24/7 protection for your business operations.
security.card_3.title:
DATA PRIVACY
& ACCESS GOVERNANCE
security.card_3.text: We believe your data belongs to you. Our privacy philosophy is backed by strict software and hardware controls that limit information access strictly to authorized personnel and processes. We utilize advanced encryption for data in transit and at rest, ensuring that sensitive information remains invisible to prying eyes. Our policies are designed to minimize data exposure, adhering to a strict "need-to-know" principle that places your privacy at the forefront of our technology."
pricing.hero.title:
FLEXIBLE PLANS
FOR EVERY STAGE OF YOUR PAYMENT OPERATIONS
pricing.hero.description: Start free, scale as your transaction volume and operational needs grow.

policy.hero.title: YOUR PRIVACY. OUR RESPONSIBILITY.
policy.hero.description: How Urenkoff SA collects, uses, and protects your information.
policy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
policy.description: Urenkoff SA (“we”, “our”, “us”) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you visit our website or contact us.
policy.item_2.title: 2. Information We Collect
policy.item_2.text_1: We may collect the following information:
policy.item_2.list_item_1: Contact details (such as name, email address, phone number) when you contact us
policy.item_2.list_item_2: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
policy.item_2.list_item_3: Usage data related to how you interact with our website
policy.item_2.text_2: We do not knowingly collect sensitive personal data unless explicitly provided by you.
policy.item_3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
policy.item_3.list_item_1: Respond to inquiries and business requests
policy.item_3.list_item_3: Ensure website security and proper functionality
policy.item_3.list_item_4: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
policy.item_4.title: 4. Data Sharing
policy.item_4.text: We do not sell or rent your personal data. Information may be shared only:
policy.item_4.list_item_1: With trusted service providers necessary for website operation
policy.item_4.list_item_2: When required by law or regulatory authorities
policy.item_5.title: 5. Data Security
policy.item_5.text: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
policy.item_6.title: 6. Data Retention
policy.item_6.text: Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.
policy.item_7.title: 7. Your Rights
policy.item_7.text: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us at sales@urenkoff.com.
policy.item_8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
policy.item_8.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be published on this page with a revised effective date.
